cause.description:
The Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Association exists to provide comprehensive information, support, and advocacy for women and girls with the condition known as polycystic ovary syndrome.
1. The public and health professionals should be more aware about PCOS.
2. Women affected should have a way to stay informed and be supported.
cause.mission: Raise awareness about PCOS and provide support for women who suffer from PCOS
cause.name: PCOS Awareness and Support
